Hi! I am a Computational Plankton Ecologist. This means that I study plankton ecology from very large datasets, which I torture using diverse computational tools. I am currently a Research Scientist at the National Oceanography Centre ([NOC](https://noc.ac.uk/)) in Southampton, UK.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

# Curriculum

Current \| **Research Scientist**, *Zooplankton diversity in biogeochemical modelling using machine learning*, National Oceanography Centre, Southampton, UK.

2019-2023 \| **PhD Thesis in Ecology**, *Plankton distribution across scales: contribution from artificial intelligence to plankton ecology*, Laboratoire d’Océanographie de Villefranche, Sorbonne Université, France. [Manuscript](reports/panaiotis_thesis_revised.pdf){target="_blank"}

2018-2019 \| **Master in Marine Sciences**, Sorbonne Université, France.

2017 \| **"Agrégation" in Life Sciences, Earth and Universe Sciences**, rank 15/1500, ENS Paris-Saclay, France.

2014-2015 \| **BSc in Biology**, ENS Paris-Saclay, France.

2014 \| Admitted into **École Normale Supérieure Paris-Saclay**, rank 37/700.
